name: Jigsaw Pussy: Hardcore Explicit Sex
description:
JIGSAW PUSSY is a puzzle game, you only need to swap the bricks to restore the pictures. The game support cheating mode and browsing pictures with one hand so that you can unlock all pictures in just one minute. There is no time or star limit in the game, you are supposed to enjoy the relaxing experience. This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.

- Nudity or sexual content
- Not suitable for watching at work (NSFW)
- Not suitable for all ages
- All characters in the game are over 18 years old

JIGSAW PUSSY is a classic jigsaw puzzle game. These puzzles will surely prove a tricky test for your brain. The beauty and elegance of the puzzles will surely make you fall in love with them. So just lean back, relax, and refresh your mind with this huge collection of puzzles. This slide puzzle game will improve your thinking skills, speed, and hand-eye coordination.



You will have three difficulty levels to choose from. Just click and drag the part to the place you think is most appropriate.
If you want, you can enable the function of rotating the parts. Just select the rotate box (in the configuration) and every two mouse clicks, the part will rotate.
